title: What Are The Rules When It Comes To Passing A Cops On The Highway?
description:
Have you noticed car passing officers on the highway because they're from a different county? Bert noticed it this morning, but he has a few questions. Can a cop pull you over in a different county they don't work for? We discuss.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
